page.title: 20REVIEW OF THE BLOCK 2
page.content: THE{COTSWOLD HILLS}FORM A BOUNDARY TO THE EAST OF THE TOWN PROHIBITING FURTHER RESIDENTIAL DEVELOPMENT AND PROVIDING AN AREA OF OPEN SPACE FOR LEISURE. A FEATURE OF THE BLOCK IS THE TOWN{CEMETERY AND CREMATORIUM.}THIS SERVES CHELTENHAM AND MUCH OF THE SURROUNDING DISTRICT. MUCH OF THE 20TH CENTURY RESIDENTIAL DEVELOPMENT IS FUNCTIONAL AND RATHER PLAIN IN COMPARISON TO THE FINE REGENCY BUILDINGS FOUND IN THE CENTRE OF TOWN. {SERVICES}IN THE URBAN AREA{ARE {DIMINISHING,}WITH FEWER BUSES, THE RECENT CLOSURE AND DEMOLITION OF THE LOCAL SECONDARY SCHOOL, AND THE NEGLECTED AIR OF THE FEATURELESS PLAYING FIELDS WHICH SUGGESTS THAT THE AREA{FACES DECLINE.}YET IT IS {SURROUNDED BY}SOME OF ENGLAND'S{MOST {BEAUTIFUL AND FAVOURED COUNTRYSIDE.
